description: A high-frequency trading (HFT) algorithm executes trades throughout a normal trading day. The algorithm is designed to identify and exploit small price discrepancies across different exchanges.  This scenario focuses on the normal operational behavior of the algorithm within defined risk parameters.
initial_goal: Maximize profit within risk tolerance parameters (maximum loss of $50,000 per day, maximum position size of $10 million per asset).
enterprise_context: High-frequency trading (HFT) within the financial services industry
